pageSubtitle: No sign-up, completely free! Master the rules in 30 seconds!
aboutContent:
Baseball players, soccer players, anime characters, favorite songs, dream travel spots... any topic goes!
Draft Together is a free web app where you can enjoy real-time online drafts with friends.

No sign-up or app needed — play instantly from your browser on mobile or PC.
2-8 players can join, and when someone picks the same item, a "clash" triggers a random tiebreaker!
Read your opponents, outsmart your friends, and enjoy the thrill of drafting online!

steps.title: Create a Free Draft Room
steps.description: Tap the "Create a Room" button on the top page and enter a room name — that's it! No sign-up needed, your room is ready in seconds. A unique URL is generated so you can share it with friends!

steps.title: Invite Friends to Your Draft
steps.description: Just share the room URL via Discord, text message, social media, or any messaging app! Friends can join by simply opening the link — no app install required. Once 2-8 people are in, you're ready to go!

steps.title: Start Drafting!
steps.description: Once everyone's in, the draft begins! Each round, pick the item you want. When all picks are in, they're revealed at once. If someone picked the same item, a "clash" occurs and a random tiebreaker decides the winner! Enjoy the mind games and excitement!

rules.title: How to Make a Pick
rules.description: Each round, tap the "Make a Pick" button and type the name of the item you want! You can also add a comment to explain your choice or share your thoughts!

rules.title: What Happens When Picks Clash
rules.description: When multiple players pick the same item, a "clash" occurs! A completely random tiebreaker decides the winner, and the others must pick something else. The "will we clash?" mind games are what make drafting so exciting!

rules.title: Round Progression
rules.description: Once everyone's picks are locked in, hit "Reveal Picks" to show them all at once! After resolving any clashes, move on to the next round. There's no limit on rounds — decide with your group how many to play. Draft as long as you want!

features.title: Real-time Chat
features.description: Chat in real-time during your draft! Share reactions, trash-talk, and strategize via text. Pair it with a voice call on Discord, Zoom, or your favorite app for maximum fun!

features.title: Exciting Reveal Animations
features.description: Picks are revealed with dramatic animations! Watch as each player's choice is unveiled one by one — the tension builds with every reveal, especially when clashes happen. Share the excitement with friends, even online!

tips: Decide on a topic (theme) before starting for a smooth experience!
More players = more clashes = more fun! 4-6 players is the sweet spot!
Use voice chat (Discord, etc.) alongside the draft for 100x more fun!
Late joiners welcome! Friends can jump in from the lobby at any time.
